00036 $rulenumber = $_GET['rulenumber'];
00037 $rule = $_SESSION['pfw']->filter->rules[$rulenumber];
00038 
00039 if ($_SESSION['edit']['type'] != 'filter') {
00040     unset ($_SESSION['edit']['save']);
00041     unset ($_SESSION['edit']['rulenumber']);
00042     $_SESSION['edit']['type'] = 'filter';
00043 }
00044 
00045 if ($_SESSION['edit']['rulenumber'] != $rulenumber) {
00046     unset ($_SESSION['edit']['save']);
00047     $_SESSION['edit']['rulenumber'] = $rulenumber;
00048 }
00049 
00050 if (!isset($_SESSION['edit']['save']) && isset($rule['type'])) {
00051     unset ($_SESSION['edit']['save']);
00052     $_SESSION['edit']['save'] = $_SESSION['pfw']->filter->rules[$rulenumber];
00053 }

00059     $_SESSION['pfw']->filter->delEntity ("from", $_GET['rulenumber'], $_GET['dropfrom']);
00060     reload();
00061 }

00184     reload();
00185 }

00202 if (count($_POST)) {
00203     $_SESSION['pfw']->filter->rules[$rulenumber]['type'] = $_POST['type'];
00204     $_SESSION['pfw']->filter->rules[$rulenumber]['direction'] = $_POST['direction'];
00205     $_SESSION['pfw']->filter->rules[$rulenumber]['log'] = $_POST['log'];
00206     $_SESSION['pfw']->filter->rules[$rulenumber]['quick'] = ($_POST['quick'] ? true : "");
00207     $_SESSION['pfw']->filter->rules[$rulenumber]['state'] = $_POST['state'];
00208     $_SESSION['pfw']->filter->rules[$rulenumber]['comment'] = $_POST['comment'];
00209     $_SESSION['pfw']->filter->rules[$rulenumber]['label'] = preg_replace("/\"/", "", $_POST['label']);
00210     $_SESSION['pfw']->filter->rules[$rulenumber]['tag'] = preg_replace("/\"/", "", $_POST['tag']);
00211     $_SESSION['pfw']->filter->rules[$rulenumber]['tagged'] = preg_replace("/\"/", "", $_POST['tagged']);
00212     $_SESSION['pfw']->filter->rules[$rulenumber]['icmp-code'] = $_POST['icmp-code'];
00213     $_SESSION['pfw']->filter->rules[$rulenumber]['icmp6-code'] = $_POST['icmp6-code'];
00214     $_SESSION['pfw']->filter->rules[$rulenumber]['family'] = $_POST['family'];
00215     $_SESSION['pfw']->filter->rules[$rulenumber]['fastroute'] = ($_POST['fastroute'] ? true : "");
00216     $_SESSION['pfw']->filter->rules[$rulenumber]['allow-opts'] = ($_POST['allow-opts'] ? true : "");
00217 
00218   if ($_POST['type'] == "block") {
00219     $_SESSION['pfw']->filter->rules[$rulenumber]['blockoption'] = $_POST['blockoption'];
00220   } else {
00221     unset($_SESSION['pfw']->filter->rules[$rulenumber]['blockoption']);
00222   }
00223 
00224     if (isset($_POST['flags']) && !strpos($_POST['flags'], "macro")) {
00225         $_SESSION['pfw']->filter->rules[$rulenumber]['flags'] = $_POST['flags'];
00226     } else {
00227         unset($_SESSION['pfw']->filter->rules[$rulenumber]['flags']);
00228     }
00229 
00230     if (isset($_POST['probability']) && !strpos($_POST['probability'], "percent")) {
00231         $_SESSION['pfw']->filter->rules[$rulenumber]['probability'] = $_POST['probability'];
00232     } else {
00233         unset($_SESSION['pfw']->filter->rules[$rulenumber]['probability']);
00234     }
00235 
00236     if (($_POST['queue-pri'] != "") && ($_POST['queue-sec'] != "")) {
00237         $_SESSION['pfw']->filter->rules[$rulenumber]['queue']['0'] = $_POST['queue-pri'];
00238       $_SESSION['pfw']->filter->rules[$rulenumber]['queue']['1'] = $_POST['queue-sec'];
00239     } elseif ($_POST['queue-pri'] != "") {
00240         $_SESSION['pfw']->filter->rules[$rulenumber]['queue'] = $_POST['queue-pri'];
00241     } else {
00242         unset ($_SESSION['pfw']->filter->rules[$rulenumber]['queue']);
00243     }
00244 
00245     if (isset($_POST['all'])) {
00246         $_SESSION['pfw']->filter->rules[$rulenumber]['all'] = true;
00247         unset($_SESSION['pfw']->filter->rules[$rulenumber]['from']);
00248         unset($_SESSION['pfw']->filter->rules[$rulenumber]['fromport']);
00249         unset($_SESSION['pfw']->filter->rules[$rulenumber]['to']);
00250         unset($_SESSION['pfw']->filter->rules[$rulenumber]['port']);
00251     } else {
00252         unset ($_SESSION['pfw']->filter->rules[$rulenumber]['all']);
00253     }
00254 }
00255 
00256 $rule = $_SESSION['pfw']->filter->rules[$rulenumber];
00257 
00258 /*
00259 * go back
00260 */
00261 if (isset($_POST['cancelme']) && ($_POST['cancelme'] == 'cancel')) {
00262     
00263     $_SESSION['pfw']->filter->rules[$rulenumber] = $_SESSION['edit']['save'];
00264     unset ($_SESSION['edit']);
00265     if (!isset($_SESSION['pfw']->filter->rules[$rulenumber]['type'])) {
00266         $_SESSION['pfw']->filter->del ($rulenumber);
00267     }
00268     header ("Location: filter.php");
00269 }
00270 
00271 if (isset($_POST['save']) && $_POST['save'] == "save and return") {
00272     unset ($_SESSION['edit']);
00273     header ("Location: filter.php");
00274 }

00279 
00280 <script type="text/javascript">
00281 function hide(obj) {
00282     document.getElementById(obj).style.display='none';
00283 }
00284 function show(obj) {
00285     document.getElementById(obj).style.display='';
00286 }
00287 function hideshow(obj) {
00288     if (document.getElementById(obj).style.display == '') {
00289         document.getElementById(obj).style.display='none';
00290     } else {
00291         document.getElementById(obj).style.display='';
00292     }
00293 }
00294 
00295 function manual_hideall() {
00296   hide('basic');
00297   hide('parameters');
00298   hide('addresses');
00299   hide('stateinspection');
00300   hide('osmatch');
00301   hide('queues');
00302   hide('examples');
00303 }
00304 
00305 function manual_showonly(obj) {
00306   manual_hideall();
00307   show(obj);
00308 }
00309 
00310 function page_init() {
00311 <?php print  (($rule['user'] || $rule['group']) ? "" : "hide('usertable');" ). "\n" ?>
00312 <?php print  (($rule['label'] || $rule['tag'] || $rule['tagged']) ? "" : "hide('tagtable');" ). "\n" ?>
00313 <?php print  ($rule['os'] ? "" : "hide('ostable');" ). "\n" ?>
00314 <?php print  ($rule['queue'] ? "" : "hide('queuetable');" ). "\n" ?>
00315 <?php print  (($rule['fastroute'] || $rule['route-to'] || $rule['reply-to'] || $rule['dup-to'] ) ? "" : "hide('routetable');" ). "\n" ?>
00316 <?php print  (($rule['allow-opts'] || $rule['probability']) ? "" : "hide('othertable');" ). "\n" ?>
00317 
00318 show('hideshowlinks');
00319 manual_hideall();
00320 }
00321 </script>
